newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Current Australian Takeovers (F to O) -Oct 21.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Current Australian Takeovers (F to O) -Oct 21.

text.p: TERMS: A$0.26 cents cash per ordinary share.
NOTES: The offerer proposes to acuire all the issued
capital of the offeree on an unconditional basis. GES directors have advised shareholders take no action pending further advice.
OFFEROR: Suncorp Insurance and Finance, the Queensland Industry Development Corp.
TERMS: The proposed merger values Metway at A$4.65
ex-dividend. Bid was raised to A$4.80 per share on June 26.
NOTES: The offer is through a scheme of arrangement and
was subject to court, shareholder and regulatory approval.
TERMS: Normandy to offer 425 of its shares for every
NOTES: North Flinders is about 50 percent owned by

Posgold Ltd, which is currently subject to a merger proposal by Normandy. Offer is conditional on successful completion of the proposed Normandy/Posgold/Gold Mine of Kalgoorlie merger which was approved by shareholders on August
16. Offeror is entitled to 73.73 percent of North Flinders' capital. Directors recommended shareholders accept the bid. Court approval for the scheme of arrangement was received on August 22.
NOTES: Directors advise shareholders to reject the
offer, following an independent report that valued its shares between A$1.92 and A$2.14. Offeror is entitled to 96.47 percent of the offeree.
